data.comment: The match has started at Goodison Park.
Simon Hooper signals a Brighton throw-in in Everton's half.
In the minute 2, Dominic Calvert-Lewin of Everton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Everton push forward at Goodison Park and Richarlison gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Brighton defence.
Seamus Coleman for Everton drives towards goal at Goodison Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Everton.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 4, Brighton's Steven Alzate has been booked in Liverpool.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Everton.
Throw-in for Everton in the half of Brighton.
In the minute 9, Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Everton to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
Free kick for Everton in the half of Brighton.
Throw-in high up the field for Brighton in Liverpool.
In the minute 14, In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Everton drive upfield and Gylfi Sigurdsson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Brighton defender.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
In the minute 16, Dominic Calvert-Lewin scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Gylfi Sigurdsson.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Everton at Goodison Park.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Brighton just outside Everton's area.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
Everton to take a throw-in in Brighton territory.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 24, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Richarlison.
Richarlison (Everton) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Alex Iwobi.
Simon Hooper awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
Goal kick for Everton at Goodison Park.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 32, Everton's James Rodriguez misses with an attempt on goal.
Brighton have a goal kick.
Throw-in Brighton.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Liverpool Brighton's Neal Maupay is caught offside.
Free kick Brighton.
In the minute 38, Brighton's Aaron Connolly is whistled for offside at Goodison Park.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Brighton.
Brighton drives forward and Leandro Trossard gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 41, Goal! Neal Maupay equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Simon Hooper awards the away team a throw-in.
In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 44, Lewis Dunk of Brighton gets in a strike, but is off target.
Simon Hooper awards Everton a goal kick.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Liverpool.
In the minute 45, Brighton will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Everton.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Goal! Everton have taken a 2-1 lead courtesy of a header from Yerry Mina.
James Rodriguez instrumental with a fine assist.
The second-half is underway at Goodison Park.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Everton in the half of Brighton.
The away team replace Tariq Lamptey with Joel Veltman.
Brighton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
James Rodriguez (Everton) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Everton close to the penalty box.
In Liverpool Brighton attack through Solly March. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Liverpool.
In the minute 50, Simon Hooper signals a throw-in for Everton, close to Brighton's area.
Brighton have a goal kick.
Brighton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Brighton in the half of Everton.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Everton take a comfortable 3-1 lead thanks to James Rodriguez.
In the minute 52, Alex Iwobi with an assist there.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Brighton in their own half.
Can Brighton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
In the minute 55, Everton have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
Simon Hooper waits before resuming play because James Rodriguez for Everton is still down.
Everton's Dominic Calvert-Lewin breaks free at Goodison Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
In the minute 58, The home team have replaced Seamus Coleman with Fabian Delph. This is the second substitution made today by Carlo Ancelotti.
In the minute 59, Everton's James Rodriguez is back in action after a slight knock.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
In the minute 61, Simon Hooper signals a Brighton throw-in in Everton's half.
Free kick Brighton.
Simon Hooper signals a Everton throw-in in Brighton's half.
In the minute 64, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Everton.
Free kick Everton.
In the minute 66, Adam Lallana is replacing Aaron Connolly for the away team.
Neal Maupay (Brighton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Yves Bissouma (Brighton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 70, James Rodriguez puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 4-1.
Great play from Abdoulaye Doucoure to set up the goal.
Free kick for Brighton in their own half.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Everton at Goodison Park.
Important block from the Everton defence as Adam Webster fires in a strike for Brighton.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
In the minute 78, Brighton's Leandro Trossard gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
Everton make their third substitution with Theo Walcott replacing James Rodriguez.
In the minute 79, Throw-in Everton.
Throw-in for Everton in the half of Brighton.
Ball safe as Brighton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, Graham Potter (Brighton) is making a third substitution, with Pascal Gross replacing Steven Alzate.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
In the minute 82, Simon Hooper awards Everton a goal kick.
Brighton to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
In the minute 86, Leandro Trossard (Brighton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
In Liverpool, Neal Maupay of Brighton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Brighton.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Brighton have a dangerous throw-in.
Brighton have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
Brighton are coming forward and Leandro Trossard gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Everton have a goal kick.
It's 4-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Yves Bissouma keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 4-2.
Solly March instrumental with a fine assist.
